verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w corners|strong="G1137"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w holding|strong="G2902"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w winds|strong="G0417"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w wind|strong="G0417"\w* should \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w blow|strong="G4154"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w tree|strong="G1186"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w ascending|strong="G0305"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w east|strong="G0395"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seal|strong="G4973"\w* of the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* to the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* it was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Hurt|strong="G0091"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* the \w trees|strong="G1186"\w*, \w till|strong="G0891"\w* we have \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foreheads|strong="G3359"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which were \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w*: \add and there were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* an \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* \add and\add* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add and\add* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w tribes|strong="G5443"\w* of the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Juda|strong="G2448"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="G4502"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Gad|strong="G1045"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Aser|strong="G0768"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Nepthalim|strong="G3508"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Manasses|strong="G3128"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="G4826"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Levi|strong="G3017"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="G2466"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Zabulon|strong="G2194"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*. \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="G0958"\w* \add were\add* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*.

\w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5023"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G0846"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w number|strong="G0705"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kindreds|strong="G5443"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*, \w clothed|strong="G4016"\w* with \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w robes|strong="G4749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w palms|strong="G5404"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Salvation|strong="G4991"\w* to \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* round \w about|strong="G2945"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add about\add* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w faces|strong="G4383"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*: \w Blessing|strong="G2129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2479"\w*, \add be\add* unto \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, What are \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w arrayed|strong="G4016"\w* in \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w robes|strong="G4749"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w* whence \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w they|strong="G4159"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w said|strong="G2046"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w knowest|strong="G1492"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* they which \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w washed|strong="G4150"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w robes|strong="G4749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G3021"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w white|strong="G3021"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="G4637"\w* \w among|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

They shall \w hunger|strong="G3983"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w thirst|strong="G1372"\w* \w any|strong="G3361"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*; \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* shall the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w light|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w heat|strong="G2738"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w in|strong="G0303"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* shall \w feed|strong="G4165"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w lead|strong="G3594"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w fountains|strong="G4077"\w* of \w waters|strong="G5204"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall wipe \w away|strong="G1813"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*.
